scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:default" "npm run dev:service1" "npm run dev:service2" "npm run dev:api"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:default && npm run deploy:service1 && npm run deploy:service2 && npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:dispatch
scripts.deploy:default: npm run build:default && cpx package.json services/default && gcloud app deploy --project nuxt-services services/default/app.yaml --quiet && rm services/default/package.json
scripts.deploy:service1: npm run build:service1 && cpx package.json services/service1 && gcloud app deploy --project nuxt-services services/service1/app.yaml --quiet && rm services/service1/package.json
scripts.deploy:service2: npm run build:service2 && cpx package.json services/service2 && gcloud app deploy --project nuxt-services services/service2/app.yaml --quiet && rm services/service2/package.json
